author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bluelife Says To Dispose Shares In Circle Square Holding Co‍​
text:
March 30 (Reuters) - Bluelife Ltd:
* SIGNED A SHARE PURCHASE AGREEMENT FOR THE DISPOSAL OF ITS 100% SUBSIDIARY, CIRCLE SQUARE HOLDING COMPANY LIMITED ‍​
* BLUELIFE - DEAL FOR A TOTAL CONSIDERATION OF 366 MILLION RUPEES, REPRESENTING THE GROSS CONSIDERATION OF 655 MILLION RUPEES NET OF THE SECURED DEBT OF CSHCL ‍​ Source text for Eikon: goo.gl/aVubKU Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
